synopsis.text: The narrative revolves around Aya Tachibana, a sixth-grader who finds herself constantly worrying about friends, family, and academic performance. A chance encounter at a cram school leads her to join the eccentric 'Detective Team KZ'. This team, comprising four distinctive boys, takes on modern-day mysteries and puzzling cases. The team includes the charismatic leader Kazuomi Wakatake, the enigmatic relationship guru Takakazu Kuroki, the brilliant and composed math whiz Kazunori Uesugi, and the kind-hearted science and social affairs expert Kazuhiko Kozuka. Aya, with her linguistic prowess, fits perfectly as the team's language expert. Despite occasional squabbles, the team combines their unique skills to crack intriguing cases, proving that teamwork can indeed conquer all.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
